name: Panic (2020)
description:
Panic is a hybrid turn-based/action strategy game. As a wizard's apprentice lost in a magical forest, your goal is to find the keystones scattered around the level and escape past the barrier. The only thing standing between you and freedom are the monsters of the night, so be extra careful not to wander into their gaze...

Keep your eyes out, for you know not what lies behind each corner, lest you succumb to fear and begin to.... PANIC.

Traverse strategically through 32 levels and attempt to complete each in the fewest steps possible to achieve the highest score!

This is an unfinished internal project from MilkShed Games that stopped production for other projects. The original creator of the game's concept is Matthew Roy. His original version of the game can be found here.

Team Members:

Matthew Roy - Lead Game Programmer

Nicholas Robbins - Game Programmer

Sam Scott - Game Programmer

Christine Brumbaugh - Lead Game Designer

Joseph Martellucci - Game Designer

Dylan Gooley - Lead Game Artist

Nicholas Oprisu - Game Producer
